what_is_the_project_one_sentence: Urban Points is a loyalty/rewards system with separate Flutter mobile apps for customers and merchants, a Next.js web dashboard, Firebase backend, targeting the Lebanon marketâ€”but I haven't verified the actual business logic, user workflows, or data models from code.
why_not_if_false: Haven't read the main entry points (backend/index.ts, main.dart files) to understand business logic
Don't know the actual user workflows (customer earning/redemption, merchant reconciliation, admin functions)
Haven't verified data models, API contracts, or integration points (Stripe, Firebase Firestore schema)
Don't know which features are complete vs incomplete beyond surface-level dead code detection
Haven't verified the deployment process, environment setup, or post-deploy validation steps
Can't explain why architectural decisions were made (Firebase vs custom backend, monorepo structure, etc.)
Don't know the critical path items or business priorities from code alone
exact_entrypoints_you_will_read_first: source/backend/models/ or source/backend/services/ (data models and business logic)
Firebase configuration files (firebase.json, .firebaserc, or environment configs)
source/backend/config/ or source/backend/env.example (integration points like Stripe, Firebase)
deploy_plan_steps: Read all entry point files to map business logic and user workflows
Document the complete customer and merchant user journeys from code
Verify all external integrations (Firebase, Stripe, any third-party APIs)
Trace the data flow for critical operations (earning points, redeeming, reconciliation)
Review authentication and authorization logic to ensure role-based access control works
Identify and verify all environment-specific configurations (dev, staging, production)
Run security audit on API endpoints and data validation logic
Execute smoke tests on all user workflows to verify nothing is broken
Review CI/CD pipeline (local-ci/) to understand automated deployment process
Create deployment runbook documenting pre-deploy checks, deployment steps, and post-deploy verification
proof_artifacts_you_will_output: ARCHITECTURE_DIAGRAM.md - Detailed system architecture with all components and integrations
USER_FLOWS_DOCUMENTED.md - Step-by-step customer and merchant workflows with code references
DATA_MODELS_SCHEMA.md - Database schema (Firestore) and API data models
INTEGRATION_VERIFICATION.md - Checklist of all external integrations verified (Stripe, Firebase, etc.)
DEPLOYMENT_RUNBOOK.md - Step-by-step deployment instructions with pre/post checks
MISSING_FEATURES_LOG.md - What's complete vs incomplete vs stubbed out
SECURITY_AUDIT_RESULTS.md - Security review of auth, API, data validation
DEPLOY_TEST_RESULTS.md - Smoke test results showing all user workflows work end-to-end
